sentences.sContent: Press the raspberries through a fine sieve to form a puree.
sentences.sCn: 用一把细筛子把黑莓压榨成浓汁。

synos.tran: [粮食][矿业]筛子；滤网；不能保守秘密的人

remMethod.val: 用筛子(sieve)过一下是为了保留(save)精华

trans.tranOther: A sieve is a tool used for separating solids from liquids or larger pieces of something from smaller pieces. It consists of a metal or plastic ring with a wire or plastic net underneath, which the liquid or smaller pieces pass through.
to put flour or other food through a sieve
